bio.basic: I am Marja Ahonen, a twenty-something computer science student from Tampere, Finland. I am completing my master's degree studies soon (= I kinda have a topic for my master's degree thesis).
bio.it: I only started programming when I started at the univeristy of Tampere back in 2014. So far I have worked at the university and Solita. At the university I worked in a team programming an Android app. We piloted indoors positioning. At Solita I was part of a team creating a web application for the employees of Solita. With the app the employees could borrow items of Solita and make reservations to them.
bio.personal: I like food. I drink a lot of tea and coffee. I want to be as strong as Wonder Woman.

titles.title: Hi y'all!
